attributes.action:
No to a second referendum upon EU membership.
The people have decided to leave.
attributes.additional_details:
The EU referendum has delivered a clear and undeniably democratic result, one that is more so than many in the recent past.
That was for the UK to leave the EU.
Mr Cameron has accepted it as the will of the people.
Brussels has accepted it as the will of the people.
But some clearly refuse to accept the will of the people because it goes against the result they want, and they are seeking to subvert the democratic process.
This makes a absolute mockery of the democratic process and shouldn't be allowed..
attributes.background: The EU referendum was conducted and had a very high turn out of around 72%, of those the majority voted to leave thus making it the democratic decision of the people.
